cast.name: 马修·蒙戈马利 Matthew Montgomery

introduction: 《Flight of the Cardinal》是一部带有些许惊悚意味的电影，它讲述的是Appalachian旅馆的拥有者Grady Wilson，在周末有三个客人来拜访他，分别是他的前经纪人和她的丈夫，还有他的男朋友安迪。他还雇佣了一个油嘴滑舌的本地南海Beetle，帮助他脱离这个地方，而这个男孩所做的第一件是就是换了Grady的抗抑郁药。是的，这个年轻的男人是一个极大的麻烦，而且他为了毁掉Grady而不择手段...Flight of the Cardinal is a creepy little thriller about Grady Wilson, the owner of an Appalachian inn who has three guests visiting him for the weekend his former agent and her husband as well as his boyfriend Andy. He also hires a smooth-talking local boy, Beetle, to help him out at the inn and one of the first things this charmer does is switch Grady's anti-depressant pills. Yeah, this young man is trouble with a capital T - and he only gets nastier as he plots to destroy Grady.
